title: Mathieu van der Poel Unleashed: Can He Rewrite Cycling History with a Classics Sweep?
content:
Analysis: Not even Eddy Merckx at the peak of his powers could sweep all the spring monuments, but that's exactly what 'MVDP' is hoping to do.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel Unleashed: Can He Rewrite Cycling History with a Classics Sweep? on Velo.
author: ahood
